entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IOptionsMonitor does not handle named options correctly #110595
  • Suspiscous comment about constrained calls in `MemoryExtensions.cs`, `StringBuilder.cs`, and `DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler.cs` #110594
  • Finalize experimental connection Activities #110593
    Future
  • Expression tree vs .NET 9 - compilation error #110592
  • macOS: RSA.Create and Import fails with > 8192-bit keys #110588
    10.0.0
  • Repeated return in ArrayPool #110582
  • Multiple test failures when connecting to corefx-net-http11.azurewebsites.net #110578
  • ObjectDisposedException in HTTP/1.1 Stress #110577
    10.0.0
  • Test failures in `JSImportGenerator.Unit.Tests.Compiles.ValidateGeneratedSourceOutput` #110575
  • Are both System.Management and Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure dead? #110573
  • [GC] Could SVR::memcopy be more efficient? #110571
  • [API Proposal]: Support for Dynamic Event IDs in LoggerMessage Source Generator #110570
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 21 Regressions on 12/3/2024 10:12:58 PM #110581
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: System.IO.Compression.Brotli Regressions on 12/6/2024 12:52:57 AM #110583
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 12/2/2024 3:41:04 PM #110584
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 12/4/2024 5:32:55 PM #110585
  • Postpone marking DAM members until type allocated #110563
  • Error CS0009: Metadata file '/__w/1/s/artifacts/tests/coreclr/AnyOS.x64.Checked/readytorun/determinism/crossgen2determinism/crossgen2smoke/helperildll.dll' could not be opened #110559

Closed

  • Crash caused by orphaned locks #44071
    Future
  • .NET 9 can not be installed on older macOS #109750
  • [API Proposal]:Add property to HttpClient #110555
  • Consider offering a way to disable `libmsquic` testing #110556
  • Intermittent System.IO Errors During Build, Rebuild, and Clean Operations #110328
  • TCP FastOpen does not work in some Linux .NET binaries #110560
    10.0.0
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization][tracking] Regressions of text APIs when running in *HybridGlobalization* mode. #94473
    10.0.0
  • [Fuzzlyn] JIT: Assertion failed 'IsMultiRegNode()' during 'Head and tail merge' #110316
    10.0.0
  • iOS test fails with "App is not signed" #110395
  • Network-path references in Uri class are not being parsed #110549
  • [browser][Windows] Chrome WBT timeout on helix if we update chrome #107466
    10.0.0
  • SpawnBrowserAsync on Windows #107771
    10.0.0
  • JSSignatureContext.cs may include incorrect use of Math.Abs #84996
    10.0.0
  • Host: Consider removing of destructors on types used for statics #36580
  • [DAC] ISOSDacInterface:GetMethodDescData reads from nullptr #109877
    10.0.0
  • Semantic Versioning of Azure packages and the System Namespace #110519
  • Test failure: System.Reflection.Tests.InvokeInterpretedTests.VerifyInvokeIsUsingInterpreter_Method #110511
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: boost inlining when callee unboxes an arg #110596
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change RSA.LegalKeySizes for Apple platforms to return 8192 #110591
    area-System.Security
  • [release/9.0-staging][wasm] Workaround incorrect mono restore when building WBT #110590
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • Use FLS detach as thread termination notification on windows. #110589
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove HttpMetricsEnrichmentContext caching #110580
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Cleanup some dead code #110579
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix potential NRE in GenericSpecializationPartCreationInfo #110569
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: Include more edges in `BlockDominancePreds` to avoid a JIT crash #110568
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [browser] Remove WASM `HybridGlobalization` from runtime code #110567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [no-merge][testing] Try Apple mobile platforms on iOS 18 and XCode 16.1 #110566
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Add wa-info tool to src/mono/wasm/tools #110565
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] Don't wait for finalizers in 'IReferenceTrackerHost::ReleaseDisconnectedReferenceSources' #110558
    area-Interop-coreclr

Merged

  • Use holding thread id in AwareLock to avoid orphaned lock crash #107168
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Speed up surrogate validation in string.Normalize #110574
    area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • Switch to automatic 8.0 version updates #110586
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110481
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove duplicate IsAscii check in string.IsNormalized #110576
    area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • fix FastOpen compilation #110561
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/8.0-staging] [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110440
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Avoid comparing regnums in `GenTreeHWIntrinsic::Equals` #110535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #110163
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix return address hijacking with CET #109548
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • Enable more ILLinker skipped tests on native AOT #110353
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Remove no_inlining functionality for dead bblocks #110468
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Include more edges in `BlockDominancePreds` #110531
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Disable HybridGlobalization tests on WASM #110526
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] fix code gen overflow #110539
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix AV error in DAC on Linux/MacOS #110557
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove ld_classic in 16+ #110542
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [dac] Make `GetObjectStringData` return the needed buffer element count instead of byte count #110540
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Fix calculation of `MethodDesc` optional slot addresses #110491
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Don't wait for finalizers in 'IReferenceTrackerHost::ReleaseDisconnectedReferenceSources' #110551
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: extract BBJ_COND to BBJ_ALWAYS profile repair as utility #110494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Speed up surrogate validation in HttpUtility #110478
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • Fix test under JIT stress #110538
    area-System.Reflection, test-bug, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Update to .NET 10 build images #110198
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Avoid all compiler optimization on embedded apphost hash #110554
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [Profiler] Avoid Recursive ThreadStoreLock in Profiling Thread Enumerator #110548
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Updating xarch to utilize EVEX compares and blending where possible #110342
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Warn on method access in Requires analyzers #110086
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] Remove WASM `HybridGlobalization` from library tests, WBT and docs #110534
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [NRBF] skip the most time-consuming test case for non-Release builds to avoid timeouts for checked builds #110550
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 10.0.0
  • fix wrong arguments order in CrlCacheExpired call #110457
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` creating invalid pdb #110205
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Avoid exception when parsing AD path for port number #110224
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 9.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Remove DiagnosticSource reference from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions #110458
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.13
  • Ensure that we don't try and optimize masks for promoted fields #110485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110438
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Fix a step that becomes a go #110533
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • JIT: Add an "init BB" invariant #110404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a diagnostic mode for ArrayPool.Shared #109695
    area-System.Runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2598965 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Share threadpool configuration #110469
    area-System.Threading
  • Unify two identical implementations of class_kind in SGen GC bridges #107909
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • Warn on message formatting failure instead of crash, and fix Native AOT MakeGenericType failure #110330
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove `VisitLoopBlocksLexical` utility #110490
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Delay creation of scratch block needed by backend #110396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Refine assert for RMW check in crc32 codegen #108750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add MemoryExtensions overloads with comparer #110197
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    area-HostModel
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix aka.ms URL in host's missing framework error #110513
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for generic span casting #109136
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix `IDE0004` for object comparison #110206
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix CMP0173 policy warning with cmake 3.31 #110522
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support generic fields in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #110372
    bug, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • Fix UNC paths #110033
    area-Host
